title: India has a competitive advantage over China

content.question: Cities in India have a competitive advantage over cities in China as locations for international consumer services, such as call centers and bill processing. This advantage has its origins in which of the following?

choices.label: Low levels of primary-level education in China
The Indian government’s status as a neutral state in global political affairs
The English language legacy of British colonialism in India
Large amounts of mineral resources found in China used to manufacture goods for export
Chinese emigration to Southeast Asia in the 1800s and 1900s

content.answer: The English language legacy of British colonialism in India
